summary: 3M Company, originally Minnesota Mining and Manufacturing, is a huge American company making over 60,000 products like adhesives, safety gear, and healthcare items. Based in Minnesota, it made $35.4 billion in 2021 and has around 95,000 employees worldwide. Recently, 3M agreed to pay $10 billion to fix water pollution problems caused by harmful chemicals in their products. They knew about these issues but didn't tell people, continuing to sell the contaminated items.
title: 3M
